body.name: Summer Infant 3Dlite Double Convenience Lightweight Double Stroller for Infant & Toddler with Aluminum Frame, Two Large Seats with Individual Recline, Extra-Large Storage Basket, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 2 mins
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 47 mins
features: Lightweight: a lightweight stroller makes outings with two little ones a little easier! The 3Dlite double's durable aluminum frame weighs under 22 pounds and it offers a large seat area, plus Anti-shock front wheels and lockable rear wheels.

For travel and everyday: whether you're traveling, or running errands close to home, a lightweight, compact stroller is a must! With this double stroller for toddlers, you'll have both an everyday and travel stroller option.

Individual reclining seats: keep your kiddos comfortable and safe at all times in this double umbrella stroller with side by side seats. It HAS separate adjustable recline on each seat for comfort, as well as 5-point safety harnesses.

Compact fold: the easy compact fold with carry handle and auto lock makes it simple to store this stroller stroller and bring it on the go! Plus, the dual adjustable and removable canopies with flip-out sun visors are perfect for sunny days.
Extra storage: there's plenty of storage in this stroller so you won't have to leave anything at home. It includes two extra-large storage baskets, two rear storage pockets, and a cup holder.
body.description: The 3Dlite double convenience stroller is a double umbrella stroller that's lightweight for travel. Based on the original best-selling 3Dlite platform, it has all the features parents love - times two! The 3Dlite double weighs in at just 21.4 pounds and features an easy-fold frame with a carry handle so you can bring it along on all your adventures. Maximum weight for this toddler stroller: 50 pounds per child. Maximum weight for storage baskets: 10 pounds per side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for daily use, perfect for Disneyland
reviews.reviewText: This stroller works great! Pushes like a dream, reclines well, and has enough of an extended canopy so that both of my babies could nap well at Disneyland. We had first purchased the jeep double stroller which was terrible because it does not roll well. This one glides super well! We did have to buy a separate cup holder as the one that comes with it is flimsy and caused my drink to fall. Otherwise, it’s a 10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good stroller for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I love this stroller - nice clean neutral look, safe five point harnesses, double-tier shades above each seat to avoid glare in babies' eyes, pockets on the back of each for all the stuff babies need for their outings. It even has a cupholder! It folds and unfolds easily, is sturdy and well-made. There is a handle on one side for ease of carrying when folded. Wish I had bought this years ago!! I'm taking one star off for the weight, but it's a bit heavier than two of your typical Target umbrella strollers, because it's just much more sturdy. It's not heavy though, and certainly much lighter than my front-to-back double stroller that's sitting in my basement right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel Stroller!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this stroller for a week long trip for our 10 month old and 2 year old. They loved it! It’s lightweight, fits thru doors, and reclines almost flat. Both of my kids were able to nap in it multiple times. The storage underneath is great, a lot bigger than I expected. We were able to fit our diaper bag and multiple other things underneath. Also has 2 large pockets on the back. My husband and I are 5’9 and 5’11 and we both thought it was very comfortable to push! Could not recommend it more!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a double stroller that was lightweight and affordable. I have a pupa baby vista, but for traveling, it’s too heavy.We’ve taken this stroller to Paris, Italy, all over Germany, we’ve taken the train/metro and bus with it and it has served our family well. I’ve used it for about a year now, and other than the cup holder being too flimsy, we love it.It reclines, so the kids can sleep, the baskets are decent sized, it fits our diaper bag, umbrella, water bottles… the only thing I’d change is the canopy. Who’s is why I removed 1 star. During the summer, it doesn’t cover the kids from the sun, especially if the seats are reclined. More than half of their bodies are exposed, so we use lots of sunscreen and Muslim swaddles to cover them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this stroller. It was easy to set up. It’s light and quick to fold to put away. It fits through doorways and glides so smoothly. The handle for carrying is also the perfect height for my toddler to hold while I’m pushing the twins. The seats recline separately so one babe can snooze while the other sits up. The big back storage pockets are great for holding my wallet, keys, and phone. I love this stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stroller breaks quickly and tries to fold halfway down with child sitting in it
reviews.reviewText: Update: the first stroller I ordered had a defect where one side wasn’t secure and would try to partially fold up when I was pushing it with my child sitting in it. They sent me a free replacement, but then the second one started doing the same thing within 2-3 months. I only use the stroller every once in a while, so it hasn’t been used very much. Maybe once a week I’ll use it to take my babies to my older kids’ sports events. It was outside of Amazon’s return window, so I contacted the manufacturer and they told me they cant do anything. No refund or replacement. I ended up just ordering a different brand of double stroller .. I remember having a different double stroller about 7 years ago when my older kids were little, and it actually worked and lasted a long time with no issues. The strollers nowadays are cheaply made and break shortly after purchasing .. you would expect a stroller to last you years, rather than weeks or months.I bought this April 23, 2023. It is now May 31 and the product is broken. I am a mom of 4; two elementary kids close in age, then a one and two year old. My elementary kids do sports, so I bought this stroller to take the younger ones to watch their games. The stroller has probably gotten used about 8-10 times, for about 1-2 hours each time, and one half of the stroller is already broken. I sat my child on that side, and there seems to be an issue with the mechanism that keeps it in place; I was worried that it was going to fold up while my child was sitting there. This also made it very hard to push. Luckily I wasn’t going a far distance. Previously, it was not too hard to push until it somehow quit working within a short period of time. I’m grateful that the product is getting replaced for free. Aside from my product having defects, I like the stroller overall. It is lightweight and easy to assemble. There is a decent amount of storage space underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, great price, great design
reviews.reviewText: Easy to fold and transport, light weight, works great for my toddlers. Easy to steer. Moves easily on pavement and grass. Storage area is large and big enough for larger purse or diaper bag. There are storage areas as well behind the umbrella on each side of the stroller which are great for extra water bottles, phone, keys, etc. I would recommend this stroller! Great value for the money. So many other double strollers are $200-$300. This works great as I know in a year my kids will have outgrown it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for short trips
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for to use when out solo with "Irish twins". Makes me feel safer to be able to fold and store quickly and easily before driving away. Fits between first and second row of an Odyssey with middle seat removed and one seat slid to the middle.
